thread.section_title: Yandy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Yandy.com | www.yandy.com
thread.title: Kelly

author: Kelly
title: Kelly
text: Yandy you are amazing! After a terrible experience with another lingerie company in regards to their shipping time and customer service, it is a breath of fresh air to do business with Yandy. Their customer service team is excellent. They got back to me within hours of my inquiry. My items shipped the next day and I got them in the time promised (and I live all the way in Hawaii). Thank you Yandy, I will definitely be a return customer.
